title: 鸡捕手怎么抓更多鸡里的鸡
author: 帝婴

replies.author: 帝婴
replies.txt_content:
九耀龙翔 发表于 2019-9-3 20:51
右键变成可拾取的鸡
点了没用，只能抓原版的鸡

replies.author: 九耀龙翔
replies.txt_content:
帝婴 发表于 2019-9-3 20:53

配置文件看看是不是
\minecraft\config\roost.cfg
    # Prevent vanilla chickens from laying eggs. Of interest to modpack makers only.
    B:disableEggLaying=false
